name: Half-Elf
description: Half-elves combine what some say are the best qualities of their elf and human parents: human curiosity, inventiveness, and ambition tempered by the refined senses, love of nature, and artistic tastes of the elves.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Skill Versatility
traits.description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Two other ability scores of your choice each increase by 1 (not reflected in auto-apply â€” adjust manually).
